oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lebanese painters
Art Exhibitions -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dreams Captured by Norikian. George Zeeny cordially invites you to the opening on April 2, 1981 at the Planula Elissar Visual Art Center, Bliss str. The show will continue until April 18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dreams captured by Norikian
